title: 'Our business is truth' - China editor tells BBC to open up on women's pay
text:
'Our business is truth' - China editor tells BBC to open up on women's pay 3:06am IST - 01:37 
The BBC is failing to live up to its own editorial mission to report the truth by denying it has a problem with gender discrimination on pay, its former China editor Carrie Gracie told the British parliament’s media committee on Wednesday.
